website_summaries.verdict: Reliable Gotham Steel brand holds up its infamous nonstick reputation.
pros: Comes with removable divider that makes perfect, uniform brownies
Divider reaches the bottom and has 2 convenient handles for easy removal
Pan is truly nonstick, but the divider should be sprayed
cons: Divider should be hand-washed to avoid potential damage

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this pan. I'm able to make different kinds in one pan. Plain ones, m&m, oreo, etc... all at once. Everyone can have the kind they want! The only one I found to be a little disaster was mixing caramel in one. It leaked into a couple surrounding brownies, but was it really a disaster? They were still good! This pan is easy to use and easy to clean! The brownies just slide right out when you want one! No sticking at all. I'm actually thinking of buying another as a backup incase something happens to mine and I can't find it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than red copper
customer_reviews.text: way too small feel pictures are deceptive disappointed they want me to pay $7.00 shipping to return it Ordered the red copper one instead as it is much larger Angry enough I may just through it away rather than pay shipping & take it 30 miles to FedEx FOOEY!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: First time we used it today, was so excited-until the brownie mix oozed out the bottom of the pan (yes it was on a baking sheet as directed) causing it to burn and smoke which in turn set off the smoke alarm. I continued on in hopes of salvaging this mess but the brownies came out horrible! The only ones that were edible were the ones in the middle! The ones on the outside were hard as bricks!! What a joke!! So irritated...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Mullholand

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Followed instruction EXACTLY. Pan leaked half the batter out, Divider, even though I sprayed it with the cooking spraying stuck, and yes I let it cool to warm as instructed. Plus is it small. Pictured it to be a standard pan. May use it for meatloaf?, as that doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: snowwovel

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's f... up.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most deceiving item listed in Amazon. I typed " Brownie Bonanza Pan" this item comes up with the picture of the advertised one on TV. This pan has nothing to do with the one on the TV. Piece of garbage. I am Appalled Amazon lets this happen. Don't buy it bait and switch scheme. False internet lead allowed by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: aek

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely use this a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect timing! I was making lemon bars and brownies for a party and had been eyeing this product so I decided to give it a try. My desserts came out perfectly and were so easy to remove from the pan. I gave it 3 stars for sturdiness because I did notice the dividers do bend very easily so be careful. Another thing I noticed, the box says “metal safe utensil” however the booklet says otherwise, I can see this scratching easily so I would advise against using metal utensils. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan!! I don't even use nonstick spray on it (although it is recommended). So far, brownies are perfect every time. I have also tried Paula Deen's Gooey Butter Cake in it, and even THAT worked. AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cooking and tiny pan
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Doesn't cook evenly at all. The edges are good but the middle is raw. I tried to put more batter around the edges and less in the center the second time and the center was flat while the edges puffed up. Also the pan was a LOT smaller than anticipated. It DOES clean up very easily, everything slides right off. Definitely use a cookie sheet under because it does leak a little out of the detachable bottom. I'm middle of the road. Not really good, not really terrible. But the uneven cooking is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: CA Girl in Portland

customer_reviews.title: Not the size advertised. 11×7
customer_reviews.text: One star considering they wasted my time. Product dimensions states 14×9. However this is an 11×7 pan. I also didn't think anything of the lift out bottom as I've used baking pans like that before. However you can clearly see gaps on the bottom even with weight on it so I'm sure it will leak like a lot of people have stated. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: andrew kasper

customer_reviews.title: amazing brownie pan
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why other buyers/reviewers had problems. I love this brownie pan, it's a thousand times better than the first one I tried in which everything stuck to the sides of the pan. This new pan is a bit smaller, which actually gives better, thicker brownies. And nothing sticks, the brownies almost pop out!
customer_reviews.author: Roni Gabriellle Sacksteder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisified with how my brownies turned out. They came out perfect and without sticking. I made the brownie mix in a bowl instead of in the pan like the photo shows. That looked like it would seep out the bottom for sure. I used a cookie sheet underneath while baking and had a tiny amount of seepage. It did take longer to bake, about 45 minutes on 350. The divider and pan both came out clean. I sprayed the divider with cooking spray as the directions said. I did not spray the pan. It wasn't mentioned, so I didn't. Great easy brownies and no mess. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Worst item ever
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a flimsy box wrapped in brown paper. There were discoloration, cob webs and looked used. Description never stated it was a used or out of box product.
customer_reviews.author: Pakou Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Makes Perfect Brownies
customer_reviews.text: This pan works exactly as advertised. One box of brownie mix into the pan an insert the slicer. Don't forget to spray everything with cooking oil first. Bake as directed, let cool and lift them out with the slicer handles. The bottom insert peels off and the brownies fall out with no sticking. I do wish the grid was 3x4 instead of 3x5 to give larger brownies, but then maybe it wouldn't work as well. Anyway, I can always eat two instead of just one!
customer_reviews.author: William Weber

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. My cheaper version works as well. I ordered this as it was to be easy to clean, etc. I still have to clean the dividers with a toothbrush. I wish I had not wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: jackie balkenende

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t wait for this item but disappointed in this when I used it the first time
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait for this item but disappointed in this when I used it the first time. For some reason there are four small holes on either side of the bottom plate. The brownie mix leaked thru these holes and messed the bottom of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kerr

customer_reviews.title: BEST PAN EVER!!!! Love Brownies
customer_reviews.text: we had gotten a Gotham Steel pots and pan set and thought this came with it, but nope.. but I still wanted it, so ordered one up and I'm definitely NOT disappointed. Its so cool how the pan has a false bottom and how the dividers make each brownie the same size. Worth its weight in gold.. well err at least its weight in brownies..
customer_reviews.author: Clint Hillan

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road quality.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad little pan.... as long as youknow exactly what you are getting...but...do not recommend mixing the batter in the pan as shown and directed unless you want one heck of mess on your hands. I didn't try it but even with immediately baking the mix, you end up with batter "flash" seeping out the removable bottom. You HAVE to spray the the divider and pan or it will most definately end up with brownie cobbler.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mausey

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brownie pan! Cuts each piece evenly. Just be sure to spray the Pan and cutter real well with cooking spray. I read in reviews how the brownies mix leaks out the bottom. I just line the pan with parchment paper and spray non stick cooking spray on the paper as well. No leaks and perfectly cooked brownies! You can even add different toppings to half the pan or all. Options are endless.
customer_reviews.author: Pamcakes

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this pan so much and I almost do but the divider was sent to me warped and I could push most of it back in place (but why should I have had to) and there’s one spot that I can’t fix which makes two pieces uneven. Also it is definitely scratchable I used it once and it’s scratched. I’m upset. I tried to get a replacement for the divider & maybe the bottom pan since it got scratched up so easily on my first use but the only option is to return this item, great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to believe this would work as described. But, IT DOES. Directions and use were straightforward. It cleaned up easily with soap and water, no soaking needed. But most importantly, the brownies came out perfect. I found they cooked a little quicker than the box called for (done in 30 minutes, box said 35-40). The directions recommend adding an extra sheet-pan under the copper pan, in case it leaks. I skipped the extra pan because I lined the copper pan with parchment paper before adding the batter and divider. Made clean up and removal amazingly easy.
customer_reviews.author: reom3

customer_reviews.title: 2nd review the brownies are sticking
customer_reviews.text: Well this is my second review I have used this pan around 3 times ..the first time i used it I had no problem with it sticking...well not anymore the last two times I used it the brownies stuck I loved this pan :( hopefully the seller will see this and do something about it
customer_reviews.author: Ruth T.

customer_reviews.title: Great brownie pan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pan that would fit my air fryer so I could make brownies and this worked perfectly. I sprayed it with some Pam before adding the brownie mix and the cooked brownies came out without getting stuck.
customer_reviews.author: R. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Another great copper product
customer_reviews.text: We will make cornbread, cheesecakes, and brownies with the divider placed inside. Then, the pan alone is the right size for baking bread loaves, heating muffins, making cookies, etc. New idea - made individual pineapple upside down cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Actually works well!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this brownie pan it made all of the brownies perfect! It is well worth the money. Made our family members super happy to make brownies in this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not the original, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the rack to push the bottom up like the original came with. This is the first time I've had one that leaks out of the bottom. Otherwise, it makes the best brownies.
customer_reviews.author: D A

customer_reviews.title: REALLY A GREAT PRODUCT AND CAN BE USED FOR MORE THAN BROWNIES
customer_reviews.text: JUST A LITTLE BIT HARD TO CLEAN, I USED A TOOTHBRUSH AND THIS CLEANED IT OUT GOOD. I BOUGHT THIS ONE AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT. I ALLREADY HAVE ONE OF THESE AND I USE IT TO MAKE TURKEY DRESSING IN FOR THE HOLIDAYS, AS WELL AS FOR BROWNIES . THIS IS THE ONLY WAY TO REALLY MAKE BROWNIES
customer_reviews.author: TOM MCINTURFF

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: It sticks not much but it does. You have to spray it down so it won’t stick. I’ve baked a few batches of brownies. It has the potential of leaking, I’m guessing how it’s made like if it’s slightly bent I can see it leaking but otherwise it’s not suppose to, I still put aluminum foil just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Joub

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Says on box no need for oil, instructions say for best results, use oil. Blades are very flimsy and bend easy. Since bottom is detachable, must place on cookie sheet. Would not try to mix it in the pan, seems like it would leak.
customer_reviews.author: Nazdee

customer_reviews.title: Too small - thought it was 9 x 13 pan
customer_reviews.text: Too small - thought it was 9 x 13 pan
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tool Sorta
customer_reviews.text: It does make perfect Brownies, BUT if you don't use an electric dish washer, clean up is a hassle by hand. Some (not much) of the brownie mix will seep under the inner plate( be sure to have a cookie sheet under copper pan) and even though it's non-stick you still have to use some non-stick spray. It also says you can mix your brownie mix in the pan, don't do it. You would end up with much more seepage. Over all, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: 😒
customer_reviews.text: I made brownies a lot. Then I got this. The brownies were so hard. Idk if it was the pan or something else but I've made a lot of brownies and they have never turned out this hard before.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Bates

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best,!! I use it for all kinds of treats. Easy clean up, good portion size and might just get a second one now that I made a carrot cake in it. Turned out amazing. Love this pan. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: terriz

customer_reviews.title: User beware. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage. It does not work, brownies stick and crumble whether the pan is sprayed with cooking spray or not. Sorry that I fell for the hype!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bell

customer_reviews.title: No lift pan came with it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed because the video showed a nice lift pan when lifting bottom out but there is no lift pan. Haven't decided whether to exchange for another brand or just keep it. If I can find a lift pan I would buy and keep
customer_reviews.author: Regina Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Not all that non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea and it works well. My only issue is it is not very good in the non-stick department, especially the grid. I will just have to spray the whole thing with Pam next time: that should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M.

customer_reviews.title: Brownies Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Use your favorite box or homemade recipe and have perfect brownies every time. Cooks even no mess cleans so easy. I can’t say enough about this simple product except it’s wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies
customer_reviews.text: It works... but the coating appears to be a little thin and will probably not last too long. I do like the way they come out of the pan as long as you use plenty of non stick spray, and over all it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: First use was great. Afterwards the pan leaked batter underneath. Dont care for the separated bottom. No need for it. Even with cooking spray batter sticks to the sides of the dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and arrived on-time
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived on-time. My only complaint is that the bottom has a section that comes out and will allow the mix to fall into the bottom of the oven. Not a complete disaster, but just something to keep in mind. The rest of it works great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for uniform size bars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy pan, easy to clean and use and assures very even and same sized bar cookies every time. I could never cut my brownies to look even, no problem anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: WHIMSY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to bake brownies in a baking dish the cut them into squares. With this brownie pan I save lots of time and now have two of these pans and bake two pans at a time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it arrived quickly and well packaged. However, I was disappointed at the size of the pan. It is significantly smaller than a standard 9x13 baking pan. I used it to make a favorite batch of blondies but the pan was too small and they did not come out right because of that. It is also difficult to clean the handles of the divider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great idea poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but this sucks ! It leaks form the bottom smh !
customer_reviews.author: leo510

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use with spray on shortening. Difficulty is with cleaning the little squares individually. Have to do by hand, not dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: laurahow

customer_reviews.title: not 9 x 13
customer_reviews.text: The pan I received was 7 x 11 and not 9 x 13 as described.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Best brownie pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, “as seen on tv”. Brownies came out perfectly. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KnottyRedNymph

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it sticks. I sprayed it and let it rest. I'm not sure if I will ever get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: nice pan
customer_reviews.text: We have a different name cooper pan that's a little larger and not as deep. we use them to make fudge in and these we found that are going to have to spray the divider with pam so that it will release easy as it does in the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brownies and other items
customer_reviews.text: I love having brownies with perfect edges and this gives just that. All of the brownies have the same thickness and soft middles and crispy edges. The whole family loves!
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't bake a lot, but this was easy to use and clean and without the insert can be used for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I would not recommend or buy this again. The pieces will not stay in long enough to get it in the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: A Must for Brownie Addicts
customer_reviews.text: My brownies was perfectly made and cut with this one
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent a must have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that is very easy to clean and use. No more unevenly cut brownies. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: mrjswebb3

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: good, no need to cut it again. already divided by the same size. first use was not sticky, I didn't apply anything before
customer_reviews.author: Citaya

customer_reviews.title: misleading advertising
customer_reviews.text: Both the product box and the item write-up say you can use metal utensils with the pan, but the paper directions inside say only use wood or plastic. Also, it wasn't nearly as non-stick as advertised. Brownies had to be pushed out as crumbles. Product not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paganach

customer_reviews.title: Make a 13x9 brownie pan
customer_reviews.text: Now I know why the size was not listed. This is a very small pan. I want to cook a batch but they are about the size of a large ice cube. Bite size. One or two bites per brownie. Pan size is 7x11. Do you see that size on a box of brownies?
customer_reviews.author: Nickya Tautfest

customer_reviews.title: Individual portions maker
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make brownies and rum cake, like the individual portions that are produced. In using this pan it needs to be placed on a cookie sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Yummy brownies
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for thr baker in your life she loved it no sticking to the pan made great brownies
customer_reviews.author: tara bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: It makes perfect brownies but mine has gotten scratched a few times and we used it three times. Still makes bomb brownies though
customer_reviews.author: Gaven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for consistent size
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use a clean. I use for brownies and serving size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa One/Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I use this for muffins, not brownies. This gives me smaller muffin bites. Much easier to clean than a muffin pan.
customer_reviews.author: Nialithic

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT NONStick like it advertises.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The main reason I bought it was because it advertises how it is non-stick. Outside of box states "Super Strong Non Stick"...this is not true!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: The pan does what it's advertised to do. Follow the directions and it works great. The people that write negative reviews about this most likely did not follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: TRA

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and makes amazing brownies with no corner pieces!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved this copper brownie pan. If you follow all the directions your brownies will turn out perfect. Best pan ever
customer_reviews.author: Chesney Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Simple to clean. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I would buy it again if I really had to. But, looks like I’m gonna be keeping this for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Giammarinaro

customer_reviews.title: Not the best brownies maker
customer_reviews.text: Brownies came out without the famous crust sides. Its hard to put into words. But it is kind of like using a glass dish instead of metal.
customer_reviews.author: hassan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of a friend's introduction ! Turns out it didn't disappoint ! It's easy to clean and use, and importantly , it's the right size cake for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies in minutes
customer_reviews.text: I love this brownie pan. The divider helps to keep the portions uniform and the edges nice and crispy.
customer_reviews.author: ADawkins124

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and Brownies are always uniform.
customer_reviews.author: ssoto

customer_reviews.title: MAN! What a great Brownie maker!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Brownies and sections them perfectly and doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan a lot but it is smaller than I anticipated. However, when making brownies, some of my familly like nuts and some do not. I bought a second pan so now I make one pan with nuts and the other pan without.
customer_reviews.author: Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best Brownie maker
customer_reviews.text: I have had other perfect brownie makers and this one is by far the cleanest one I have used! This one did not come with a device to pop up the brown tray like the other ones do. But I got a little loaf tray from the dollar tree and it works perfect to raise the inside tray! Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Freeman Family

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how anyone can complain about this product. It’s great. I have no complaints. In fact, I’m ordering another one to make twice as many brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brownies
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand how anyone can rate this less than 4 stars. I just baked the yummiest and prettiest brownies thanks to this product
customer_reviews.author: Cris Mant

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Easy to clean. Perfectly shaped brownies. How did I just now discover this?
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hayes

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: love this except that the batter runs out of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not crisp edge of brownies
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping that brownies would have a crispy edge all the way around, but that's not the case. Otherwise, it's a convenient way to make brownies with no cutting needed
customer_reviews.author: Hector R.

customer_reviews.title: No need to grease the pan and it is so easy to wipe clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother and she absolutely LOVES it!!!! No need to grease the pan and it is so easy to wipe clean. She has came up with so many ideas it's mind-bottling!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A pan that is very useful with easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: My Brownies come out very nice. I don't have to cut them when ready to serve. They are already separated. Easy to come out of the pan. Just the right amount to serve. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Vanita Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: If you like them edge pieces this is your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Wicky

customer_reviews.title: Brownins that everyone likes
customer_reviews.text: So easy and fun to make brownies where each one is like a corner piece. Extremely easy to use and everyone loves the brownies.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Brock

customer_reviews.title: Scrub a dub dub
customer_reviews.text: Love this baking pan. But make aire you grass it well the corners are hard to clean. But other than that I t is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and I love the brownies
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have been baking brownies like crazy. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Robb

customer_reviews.title: Do you like brownies, then you will love the brownie pan.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great pan for brownies. Now I have evenly sliced brownies with no one getting a bigger piece than anyone else (no more fighting Kids). Clean up is so easy too it all goes in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Brownie Fun
customer_reviews.text: The divider portion is a bit tedious to clean. Pan itself is good for brownies or desserts but smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Hey you're into easy...
customer_reviews.text: If you're into easy everything about brownies than this is pretty kool.
customer_reviews.author: michael Morin

customer_reviews.title: ok works as expected  not sure how it will hold up but so far so good
customer_reviews.text: works well nice way to get even sized pieces heavier metal than previous one without copper nonstick plus seems to not overcook probably due to lighter metal
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Great brownie pan!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful brownie pan, each and every brownie has its own edges.
customer_reviews.author: Debe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you would think! Had no issues and it makes separate items where you can mix up choices and not go through a ton of baking mixes!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Brownies came out good
customer_reviews.text: I used this a couple of times. So far so good. I would recommend that you spray the pan with some PAM cooking spray prior to adding your batter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brownie pan ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this brownie pan, never tasted brownies made so right (flaky, chewy, crisp around the edges). I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meka

customer_reviews.title: Corners for All
customer_reviews.text: If you love the corner pieces in a pan of brownies, this pan gives you all corner pieces....you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Brownies tastes like metal!
customer_reviews.text: After being washed twice my brownies continue to come out tasting like a type of metal as if the brownies take on the taste from the container. I have never had this happen when using a regular Pyrex. Won’t be using this and do NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome product it's definitely worth it also inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it easy to make my brownies it's already cut for you after baking the only thing that I dislike is where the brownies is divided it's alittle difficult to clean other than that it is awesome I will tell everyone if you don't have it yet it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and no mess.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product no mess and brownies came out amazing and nothing leaked either. Everyone at my work loved the brownies

product_meta.title: Brooklyn Brownie Copper by Gotham Steel Nonstick Baking Pan with Built-In Slicer, Ensures Perfect Crispy Edges, Metal Utensil and Dishwasher Safe
product_meta.description: What Is Brooklyn Brownie Copper Pan? The 3-part Brooklyn Brownie Copper Pan allows you to create 18 mini bites and quickly serve them to your friends or family, all in the same piece of cookware. It can even be used for pizza and appetizers! You just have to mix your batter right inside the pan, insert the brownie grid, and slide it into the oven. When cooking, the even heat distribution provided by the pan's bottom, sides, and grid promise to deliver crispy edges and gooey centers in every square. After they're done, pull out the grid, and the bottom and sides separate to create the perfect serving plate. From there, each brownie will easily pop out one-by-one due to Brooklyn's non-stick, super strong surface. This also means you won't need any extra oil or butter, or have to worry about scraping and scratching.
feature_bullets: Combines nonstick, super strong surface with the convenience of a self-slicing pan
Mix your batter right inside the pan
Each brownie easily pops out of the pan one by one
No coating with butter or oil, everything slides right off
